cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Agriculture on May 17, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7675, a bill to amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to establish an Agricultural and Food System Supply Chain Resilience and Crisis Response Task Force, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 76 (Friday, May 6, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CRAIG:
H.R. 7675.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the Commerce Clause
[Page H4723]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 283.

title: To amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to establish an Agricultural and Food System Supply Chain Resilience and Crisis Response Task Force, and for other purposes.
